tuv.seg: Find how to register a death and how to obtain a death certificate
Cur síos ar an teastas báis
Information on standards in the Irish funeral industry, types of funeral and useful contacts
Cur síos ar sochraidí
Maintenance, management and how to purchase a burial plot
Leagann an cháipéis seo síos na coinníollacha a rialaíonn reiligí
Cremation is an alternative to burial, when someone dies
Nuair a fhaigheann duine bás, is féidir le duine créamadh a roghnú in ionad adhlactha
In recent years cremation has become increasingly popular
Le linn na blianta beaga anuas, tá créamadh á roghnú ag níos mó daoine in Éirinn
Bringing a body to Ireland for burial or cremation
Corp a thabhairt ar ais go hÉirinn chun é a adhlacadh nó a chréamadh
When someone dies abroad it is often difficult to know what to do
Nuair a fhaigheann duine bás thar lear is minic is deacair dul i ngreim le ba cheart a dhéanamh
Find out here the steps to take to bring a body home for burial or cremation
Léirítear na céimeanna anseo i dtaca le corp a thabhairt abhaile chun é a adhlacadh nó a chréamadh bás agus ag fáil bháis sochraidí
Sending a body from Ireland for burial or cremation abroad
Seoladh corp as Éirinn le haghaidh adhlactha nó créamtha thar lear
Before the body of a deceased person can be sent out of Ireland, certain formalities must be followed. Find out more
Sula seoltar marbhán as Éirinn tá foirmiúlachtaí áirithe a chaithfear a leanúint
Most Read in "Death and Bereavement"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Bás agus Méala"
Dealing with the deceased's estate
Deileáil le hEastát an Mhairbh
